title: The Fallen Prince
description: Now that the rightful ruler of Neospes has been reinstated, Riven is on the hunt for her father in the Otherworld to bring him to justice for his crimes against her people. When she receives an unwelcome visit from two former allies, she knows that trouble is brewing again in Neospes. The army has been decimated and there are precious few left to fight this mysterious new threat. To muster a first line of defense, her people need help from the one person Riven loathes most - her father. But what he wants in return is her complete surrender to him. Riven will have to choose: save Neospes or save herself.
author: Amalie Howard
